Player History
Drafted in 36th round, 569th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Injured on 6/10/2016 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to San Francisco on 2/8/2017 (Going to SF: P Roberto Ortiz, P Christopher Smith, 1B Robert Dunn. Going to SLB: P Jeffrey Horne)...
Had first career hit on 9/4/2017, off John Hellman (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/25/2018, off Nicholas Chidester (DET)...
Injured on 5/1/2020 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $921,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,442,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/24/2024 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $1,350,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2026, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Colorado on 9/19/2026...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/7/2027 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
